item.description:
Looking forward to seeing everyone for discussions in Italian. Come prepared to talk about your favorite Italian movie.

We will meet upstairs at Cafe Paradiso. If you are in John Jordan's class, feel free to join the group after class.

The last few meetings have only had a few people. Che peccato. If you arrive before others, feel free to come downstairs and watch the class.

group.name: The Boston Italian Language Meetup Group & Luned√¨ Italiano

item.name: The Boston Italian Language May 7 Meetup
